price: 43. Hun ogen zullen neergeworpen worden – vernedering zal hen bedekken; werden zij opgeroepen om te knielen toen zij goed en gezond waren.
arabic: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ وَقَدۡ كَانُواْ يُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمۡ سَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: khāshiʿatan abṣāruhum tarhaquhum dhillatun waqad kānū yud'ʿawna ilā al-sujūdi wahum sālimūna
